Class SpecialAbility

java.lang.Object
abilities.SpecialAbility
Direct Known Subclasses:
NukeAbility
public abstract class SpecialAbility extends Object
An abstract class on special ability which player can choose to use.

  • Constructor Summary

    Initialize the field according to given parameters.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialAbility

      public SpecialAbility(int cost, int cooldown)
      Initialize the field according to given parameters. Set currentCooldown to 0.
      Parameters:
      cost - Cost on using the ability
      cooldown - Cooldown of the ability

  • Method Details

    • activate

      public abstract void activate(Attackable target)
      This method activate ability onto the target.
      Parameters:
      target - The opponent target unit.

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Returns whether ability is ready or not. If ready, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
      Returns:
      True if currentCooldown is 0. Otherwise, return false.

    • triggerCooldown

      protected void triggerCooldown()
      Set the currentCooldown to ability's cooldown.

    • tickCooldown

      public void tickCooldown()
      If currentCooldown is more than 0, reduce it by 1.

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Returns the cost of the ability.
      Returns:
      The cost of ability as int.

    • setCost

      public void setCost(int cost)
      Sets the cost of the ability. cost cannot be less than 0.
      Parameters:
      cost - The new cost for the ability.

    • getCooldown

      public int getCooldown()
      Returns the cooldown of the ability.
      Returns:
      The cooldown of ability as int.

    • setCooldown

      public void setCooldown(int cooldown)
      Sets the cooldown of the ability. cooldown cannot be less than 0.
      Parameters:
      cooldown - The new cooldown for the ability.

    • getCurrentCooldown

      public int getCurrentCooldown()
      Returns the currentCooldown of the ability.
      Returns:
      The currentCooldown of ability as int.

    • setCurrentCooldown

      public void setCurrentCooldown(int currentCooldown)
      Sets the currentCooldown of the ability. currentCooldown cannot be less than 0.
      Parameters:
      currentCooldown - The new currentCooldown of ability as int.
